/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * function TreeNode(val) {
 *     this.val = val;
 *     this.left = this.right = null;
 * }
 */
/**
 * @param {TreeNode} root
 * @return {void} Do not return anything, modify root in-place instead.
 */
var flatten = function(root) {
  let lastNode=null
  function dfs(node){
    if(!node)return
    lastNode=node
    if(node.left)dfs(node.left)
    if(node.right){
      lastNode.left=node.right
      node.right=null
      dfs(lastNode.left)
    }
  }
  dfs(root)
  while(root){
    root.right=root.left
    root.left=null
    root=root.right
  }
};
translatedContent:
给定一个二叉树，原地将它展开为链表。

例如，给定二叉树

    1
   / \
  2   5
 / \   \
3   4   6

将其展开为：

1
 \
  2
   \
    3
     \
      4
       \
        5
         \
          6
